remarks: The predicate "is a maximal ideal".  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 5-Jan-2011.)
statement:
ismaxidl.1 $e |- G = ( 1st ` R ) $.
ismaxidl.2 $e |- X = ran G $.
ismaxidl $p |- ( R e. RingOps -> ( M e. ( MaxIdl ` R ) <-> ( M e. ( Idl ` R ) /\ M =/= X /\ A. j e. ( Idl ` R ) ( M C_ j -> ( j = M \/ j = X ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d M j $.
$d R j $.
